fullplot: Carlo's life is thrown into a tailspin when his longtime girlfriend Giulia announces she's pregnant. As Carlo faces up to his anxieties about adulthood, his buddies Paolo, Adriano and Alberto reluctantly grapple with their own responsibilities.

title: The Last Kiss

tomatoes.consensus: Well-preformed, but it's nothing we haven't seen before.
